subject: Your finance application for your Howdens products has been cancelled

rows.text: Your request to cancel your finance application has been processed. Please contact your tradesperson to arrange an alternative payment method if you would like to proceed with your Howdens order.
If this was a mistake, please contact Howdens to request a new link so that you can re-apply.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
